snippet.title: Daemon x Machina Titanic Scion - Official Announcement Trailer | Nintendo Switch 2 Direct
snippet.description:
A new Daemon x Machina mech game is coming to Switch 2 with more customized mechs to take out into an open world on Nintendo Switch 2. Check out the Daemon X Machina: Titanic Scion announcement trailer for this upcoming game created and produced by Kenichiro Tsukuda and featuring mechanical designs from Shoji Kawamori. Daemon X Machina: Titanic Scion will be available on Nintendo Switch 2, PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X/S, and PC via Steam on September 5, 2025.

#IGN #NintendoSwitch2
